attributes.action: Show that young lives matter. Take action NOW
attributes.background: It is becoming all too common place hearing that a young person has been stabbed a lot of the time resulting in death. Because it has become all too common it's almost as if it doesn't matter. Well it DOES and we DEMAND that something happens to end this madness.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
